TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceController extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 表示 Windows 服務，可以讓您連接到執行中或已停止的服務進行管理，或取得關於服務的資訊。

span.span: Represents a Windows service and allows you to connect to a running or stopped service, manipulate it, or get information about it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用類別來連接到和控制現有服務的行為。You can use the class to connect to and control the behavior of existing services. 當您建立的執行個體類別，您設定其屬性，讓它與特定的 Windows 服務的互動。When you create an instance of the class, you set its properties so it interacts with a specific Windows service. 您接著可以使用類別來啟動、 停止及操作服務。You can then use the class to start, stop, and otherwise manipulate the service. 您最可能使用元件中的系統管理的容量。You will most likely use the component in an administrative capacity. 比方說，您可以建立 Windows 或 Web 應用程式傳送自訂命令透過執行個體。For example, you could create a Windows or Web application that sends custom commands to a service through the instance. 這會是很有用，因為服務控制管理員 (SCM) Microsoft Management Console 嵌入式管理單元不支援自訂命令。This would be useful, because the Service Control Manager (SCM) Microsoft Management Console snap-in does not support custom commands. 在您建立的執行個體之後，您必須設定兩個屬性，以找出與它互動的服務： 電腦名稱和您想要控制服務的名稱。After you create an instance of , you must set two properties on it to identify the service with which it interacts: the computer name and the name of the service you want to control. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，設為 本機電腦，因此您不需要變更它，除非您想要設定為指向另一部電腦的執行個體。By default, is set to the local computer, so you do not need to change it unless you want to set the instance to point to another computer. 一般而言，在服務作者撰寫的程式碼，自訂特定命令相關聯的動作。Generally, the service author writes code that customizes the action associated with a specific command. 例如，服務可以包含程式碼來回應命令。For example, a service can contain code to respond to an command. 在此情況下的自訂處理工作執行之前，系統會暫停服務。In that case, the custom processing for the task runs before the system pauses the service. 服務可以處理的命令集取決於它的屬性;例如，您可以設定屬性，服務才能`false`。The set of commands a service can process depends on its properties; for example, you can set the property for a service to `false`. 此設定會呈現`Stop`命令無法在該特定服務上使用; 它會防止您停止從 SCM 服務停用必要的按鈕。This setting renders the `Stop` command unavailable on that particular service; it prevents you from stopping the service from the SCM by disabling the necessary button. 如果您嘗試從您的程式碼停止服務時，系統就會引發錯誤，並顯示錯誤訊息 「 無法停止`servicename`。 」If you try to stop the service from your code, the system raises an error and displays the error message "Failed to stop `servicename`." ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別來控制`SimpleService`服務範例。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to control the `SimpleService` service example. [!code-csharp[ServiceControllerClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceControllerClass/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceControllerClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceControllerClass/VB/program.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Continue() cil managed

summary.span: 在服務暫停後繼續進行。

span.span: Continues a service after it has been paused.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫服務，其狀態會先變更為`ContinuePending`，然後，當方法傳回時，它會變成`Running`。When you call for a service, its status is first changed to `ContinuePending` and then, when the method returns, it is changed to `Running`. 您不能呼叫服務，直到服務控制器狀態`Paused`。You cannot call for the service until the service controller status is `Paused`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來繼續暫停的服務。The following example demonstrates the use of the method to continue a paused service. 這個範例是供較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ServiceControllerClass#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceControllerClass/CS/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ServiceControllerClass#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceControllerClass/VB/program.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ExecuteCommand(int32 command) cil managed

param.name: command
param.span: 應用程式定義的命令旗標，用來指示要執行哪一個自訂命令。

span.span: An application-defined command flag that indicates which custom command to execute.

param.span: 這個值必須介於 128 和 256 (含) 之間。

span.span: The value must be between 128 and 256, inclusive.

summary.span: 在服務上執行自訂命令。

span.span: Executes a custom command on the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫，服務的狀態不會變更。When you call , the status of the service does not change. 如果服務已啟動，則狀態會保持`Running`。If the service was started, the status remains `Running`. 如果服務已停止，則狀態保持`Stopped`，依此類推。If the service was stopped, the status remains `Stopped`, and so on. 若要處理自訂的命令，服務必須覆寫方法，並提供所識別的命令處理常式`command`參數。To process the custom command, the service must override the method and provide a handler for the command identified by the `command` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法，以執行中的自訂命令`SimpleService`服務範例。The following code example shows the use of the method to execute custom commands in the `SimpleService` service example. [!code-csharp[ServiceContoller_ExecuteCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceContoller_ExecuteCommand/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceContoller_ExecuteCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceContoller_ExecuteCommand/VB/module1.vb#1)]

span.span: The computer from which to retrieve the services.

summary.span: 擷取指定電腦上除了裝置驅動程式服務以外的所有服務。

span.span: Retrieves all the services on the specified computer, except for the device driver services.

returns.span: 型別的陣列，其中每一元素都關聯到指定電腦上的服務。

span.span: An array of type in which each element is associated with a service on the specified computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回只有非裝置驅動程式服務並不是來自指定電腦的驅動程式的服務。 returns only the non-device driver services and the services that are not drivers from the specified computer. 若要擷取裝置驅動程式服務，請呼叫方法。To retrieve device driver services, call the method. 結合兩種方法可提供存取所有服務的電腦上。Together, the two methods provide access to all the services on a computer.

The default is the local computer (".").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 電腦名稱是伺服器執行這項服務，不含前面的反斜線字元的名稱 (\\\\)。The computer name is the name of the server that is running this service, without the preceding backslash characters (\\\\).

summary.span: 暫止服務的作業。

span.span: Suspends a service's operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不能呼叫服務，直到服務控制器狀態`Paused`。You cannot call for the service until the service controller status is `Paused`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以暫停服務。The following example demonstrates the use of the method to pause a service. 這個範例是供較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. span.span: Refreshes property values by resetting the properties to their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使， ，和在接下來參考時重設為其目前值的屬性。The method causes the , , and properties to be reset to their current values when they are next referenced. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以取得服務的狀態。The following example demonstrates the use of the method to obtain the status of a service. 程式碼會指示服務暫停，然後等候的狀態，以反映變更。The code instructs a service to pause, and then waits for the status to reflect the change. 這個範例是供較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定名稱，識別這個執行個體所參考的服務。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that identifies the service that this instance references.

value.span: 名稱，識別這個 執行個體所參考的服務。

span.span: The name that identifies the service that this instance references.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別到服務控制管理員中的服務。The identifies the service to the Service Control Manager. 變更這個屬性會導致繫結至另一個服務，它不會變更何種服務控制管理員的 Microsoft Management Console 嵌入式管理單元會顯示執行個體。Changing this property causes the instance to bind to another service, it does not change what the Service Control Manager's Microsoft Management Console snap-in displays. 當您要實作自訂服務時，這個屬性的值必須是記錄中的服務的名稱與相同對應屬性類別。When you are implementing a custom service, the value of this property must be identical to the name recorded for the service in the property of the corresponding class. 程式碼中，通常設定`main()`函式的可執行檔。In code, the is usually set in the `main()` function of the executable. 當您重設屬性，設定屬性的方法會設定這個執行個體的設為空字串 ("")。When you reset the property, the method that sets the property sets this instance's to an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您在任何服務陣列未執行，您將無法啟動此服務。If any service in the array is not running, you will not be able to start this service. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別，以顯示的信差服務所依存的服務集合。The following example uses the class to display the set of services that the Messenger service is dependent on. span.span: One of the values, used to indicate the network service type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務型別表示服務系統的使用方式。The service type indicates how the service is used by the system. 值屬性表示一組使用位元的 OR 運算子組合的旗標。The value of the property represents a set of flags combined using the bitwise OR operator. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別，以顯示本機電腦上的裝置驅動程式服務。The following example uses the class to display the device driver services on the local computer. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不能呼叫服務，直到服務控制器狀態`Running`。You cannot call for the service until the service controller status is `Running`. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別，以檢查是否已停止的 Alerter 服務。The following example uses the class to check whether the Alerter service is stopped. 如果服務已停止，此範例會啟動服務，並等待，直到服務狀態設定為 。If the service is stopped, the example starts the service and waits until the service status is set to . MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Status As ServiceControllerStatus

summary.span: 取得這個執行個體所參考之服務的狀態。

span.span: Gets the status of the service that is referenced by this instance.

value.span: 其中一個 值，表示該服務是否正在執行、已經停止或暫停，或者是否正在擱置啟動、停止、暫停或繼續命令。

span.span: One of the values that indicates whether the service is running, stopped, or paused, or whether a start, stop, pause, or continue command is pending.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 狀態指出服務的目前狀態。The status indicates the current state of the service. 一組可能的值會包含指出狀態變更的命令是暫止的數個。The set of possible values includes several that indicate whether a state-changing command is pending. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別，以檢查目前的 Telnet 服務的狀態。The following example uses the class to check the current status of the Telnet service. 如果服務已停止，此範例會啟動服務。If the service is stopped, the example starts the service. 如果服務正在執行，此範例會停止服務。If the service is running, the example stops the service. [!code-cpp[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CPP/servicecontroller.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CS/servicecontroller.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/VB/servicecontroller.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 停止這項服務和依賴這項服務的任何服務。

span.span: Stops this service and any services that are dependent on this service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何服務相依於這項服務以進行作業，它們會先停止此服務停止。If any services depend on this service for their operation, they will be stopped before this service is stopped. 屬性包含的服務相依於這個集合。The property contains the set of services that depend on this one. 如果您停止此服務所依賴的服務時，呼叫方法，在此服務內父服務的方法。If you stop a service that this service depends on, call the method on this service within the method of the parent service. 屬性包含此服務依存的服務。The property contains the services that this service depends on. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別，以檢查目前的 Telnet 服務的狀態。The following example uses the class to check the current status of the Telnet service. 如果服務已停止，此範例會啟動服務。If the service is stopped, the example starts the service. 如果服務正在執行，此範例會停止服務。If the service is running, the example stops the service. [!code-cpp[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CPP/servicecontroller.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CS/servicecontroller.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/VB/servicecontroller.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WaitForStatus(valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus desiredStatus) cil managed

span.span: The status to wait for.

summary.span: 無限期等候服務到達指定的狀態。

span.span: Infinitely waits for the service to reach the specified status.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用暫止應用程式的處理，直到服務已達到所需的狀態。Use to suspend an application's processing until the service has reached the required status. > [!NOTE] > 方法會等候大約 250 毫秒之間每個狀態檢查。The method waits approximately 250 milliseconds between each status check. 無法偵測的觀察到的服務變更大小寫`desiredStatus`，然後立即於另一個狀態在該間隔。 cannot detect the case of the observed service changing to the `desiredStatus` and then immediately to another status in that interval. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別，以檢查是否已停止的 Alerter 服務。The following example uses the class to check whether the Alerter service is stopped. 如果服務已停止，此範例會啟動服務，並等待，直到服務狀態設定為 。If the service is stopped, the example starts the service and waits until the service status is set to . [!code-cpp[ServiceController#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CPP/servicecontroller.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceController#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CS/servicecontroller.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceController#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/VB/servicecontroller.vb#1)]

exception.span: 參數不是 列舉中定義的任何一個值。

MemberSignature.Value: public void WaitForStatus (System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus desiredStatus, TimeSpan timeout);
.method public hidebysig instance void WaitForStatus(valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus desiredStatus, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Sub WaitForStatus (desiredStatus As ServiceControllerStatus, timeout As TimeSpan)

span.span: The status to wait for.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 物件，指定等候服務到達指定狀態的時間長度。

span.span: A object specifying the amount of time to wait for the service to reach the specified status.

summary.span: 等候服務到達指定的狀態或指定的逾時到期。

span.span: Waits for the service to reach the specified status or for the specified time-out to expire.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用暫止應用程式的處理，直到服務已達到所需的狀態。Use to suspend an application's processing until the service has reached the required status. > [!NOTE] > 方法會等候大約 250 毫秒之間每個狀態檢查。The method waits approximately 250 milliseconds between each status check. 無法偵測的觀察到的服務變更大小寫`desiredStatus`，然後立即於另一個狀態在該間隔。 cannot detect the case of the observed service changing to the `desiredStatus` and then immediately to another status in that interval.

exception.span: 參數不是 列舉中定義的任何一個值。

span.span: The parameter is not any of the values defined in the enumeration.

exception.span: 針對 參數指定的值已到期。

span.span: The value specified for the parameter expires.
